title: RQPLEIAD_180_04_Emergency_Outgoing_Call_By_Program_Key
preconditions: Phone has the Emergency program key

steps.step: Press the Emergency program key of the phone or addon
steps.expected:
title:  Outgoing call
Red background  
display emergency avatar and release button(led is on)
and press the emergency avatar will turn to the info screen
if press the release key will release the call

steps.step: Remote side answer the call
steps.expected:
title:  Conversation xx:xx
Red background  
display emergency avatar / new call button(led is on)
The release/ hold button are grey (led is off)

steps.step: Press the emergency avatar
steps.expected: Display the emergency info

steps.step: press the new call button
steps.expected: turn to the add new call screen

steps.step: press the hold key of the screen or the hold physical button
steps.expected: no action， can't hold the call

steps.step: pick up the handset
steps.expected: the voice will switch to handset

steps.step: Hang on the handset
steps.expected: the voice will switch to handsfree

steps.step: press the release key of the screen or the release physical button
steps.expected: no action， can't release the call

steps.step: After the call is released, check the call log
steps.expected:
Has the emergency call log (outgoing arrow)
the label /avatar /name /number/date display correctly
